welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fujiidera, a charming city known for its historic temples and beautiful natural scenery. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our wonderful city has to offer during your visit."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Itami Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'ITM Free WiFi' and accepting the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kobe Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Kobe Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal building at Kansai International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer terminal building at Kansai International Airport, mainly serving low-cost carriers and some international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but may require re-connection every 30 minutes.
